name: RainBall
description:
RainBall is a simple to control, addicting ball game for both children and adults.
Forward dropping balls to the left or right side according the colors.
Very easy to play with one finger tap. Speed of the dropping balls increases over time.

Features:
+ The colors of the balls used change randomly in each round
+ 3 chances to fail. Player may earn 3 more lives as a bonus.
+ Game Center Leaderboard and challenge
+ Share records on social media and with friends using e-mail or WhatsApp
+ All devices support with IOS8 and newer
+ Ads are not showing during the gameplay

→ → → Now that you know, just download and enjoy RainBall for FREE! ← ← ←
